plot outline: Karan is an orphan. He was brought up by his uncle who gives him the best education, and becomes a psychiatrist. Karan loves his job and loves to help people. He goes on a professional trip to a medical institution where he turns out to be the lecturer and psychiatrist. He sees things he doesn't understand. The strange occurrences intensify and even become hostile.
title: Adiyum Andamum
